title: Kraft Foods Inc.
summary: Kraft Foods Inc. was a  multinational confectionery, food and beverage conglomerate.[1] It marketed many brands in more than 170 countries. 12 of its brands annually earned more than $1 billion worldwide: Cadbury, Jacobs, Kraft, LU, Maxwell House, Milka, Nabisco, Oreo, Oscar Mayer, Philadelphia, Trident, and Tang.[2]  Forty of its brands were at least a century old.[3]
